messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Jessica
messages.msgSnippet: I was talking about both. No schooling at all. I wish I hadn t put mine in ps at all. It does promote unsocial behavior, bullying, feeling inadequate, feeling
messages.messageBody:
I was talking about both. No schooling at all. I wish I hadn't put mine in ps at all. It does promote unsocial behavior, bullying, feeling inadequate, feeling inferior and many other things. My daughter is now going through a rebellious phase...but eventually she will work her way through it. If she was still in ps, it would be compounded.
Jessica
 
Vaughnde Lee
Missoula, Montana
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com
-----Original Message-----
From: GeorganneD@... <GeorganneD@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, March 19, 2001 5:31 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Jessica

Your post said you wouldn't send children to kindergarten.  My post was
speaking of preschool.  Are we talking about the same thing?  i.e.  any such
"school" at all?
